description:
Elevate your career with us – JFE offers an opportunity to grow in Global Dynamic Environment!

We are currently seeking a Sales Assistant for our Long Beach Headquarters.
Act as interface between clients and other related parties (e.g., warehouses, freight forwarders, and suppliers), and arrange/coordinate product shipment and domestic/international logistics transaction to ensure smooth and on-time deliveries to customers.

Maintain complete and open lines of communication with other personnel, function, or department to facilitate operations and interaction in the organization, and keep supervisor informed of status and progress, ensuring that regular and periodical communication takes place. It is also expected to perform other duties and responsibilities as required or requested by supervisor or management.

Essential Job Functions include;
  1. Customer Order Fulfillment
  2. Purchase Order to Suppliers
  3. Logistics Coordination
  4. Customer Services
  5. Quality Assurance
  6. Sales Administration Support


Qualified candidates will have a Bachelors degree along with 5 years of experience with customer services, order fulfillment and logistics, or equivalent combination of education and experience.
